title: Kannuku Maiazhagu Lyrics Pudhiya Mugam Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Kannuku Maiazhagu
kavidhaiku poi azhagu
avaraikku poovazhagu
avarukku naan azhagu

malai nindra pinnaalum
ilai sindhum thuli azhagu
alai meendu ponaalum
karai konda nurai azhagu

Kannuku Maiazhagu
kavidhaiku poi azhagu
avaraikku poovazhagu
avarukku naan azhagu

aanandha manjaththal
avilndhaalum kulal ahagu
adaiyaalum muththathil
alindhaalum pottazhagu

pennodu kadhal vandhaal
piraikooda perazhagu
ennodu nee irundhaal
irul kooda orazhagu.

Kannuku Maiazhagu
kavidhaiku poi azhagu
avaraikku poovazhagu
avarukku naan azhagu
